ygData.subject: Permafrost Raid
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been to lower Guk once - it s really creepy there. I didn t go in that far - my group was composed of myself (when I was lvl 31) and a lvl 33 cleric. But
ygData.messageBody:
I've been to lower Guk once - it's really creepy
there. I didn't go in that far - my group was composed
of myself (when I was lvl 31) and a lvl 33 cleric.
But i'll hafta go there to get some nice items.<br>At
the auction today, i bought 2 silver-plated bracers
for 100plat each (quite a steal) and a serpentine
bracer. Stats are as follows:<br> silver-plated bracer:
7AC +5 sv disease and poison<br> serpentine bracer:
1AC +9AGI +3DEX<br>They give a nice platemail
appearance =)<br>Tomorrow night will be the raid on
Permafrost. Will you be able to attend, Kaylin? Gimme a tell
ingame and i'll fill you in on the details.
